issues.description: The template's Person entity declares the id field as java.util.UUID, but the rest of the codebase (PersonRepository, controllers, services, and tests) uses Long as the entity id type. This mismatch will cause compilation/runtime errors and prevents students from running or implementing the intended API (repositories and methods expect Long IDs while the entity exposes a UUID). The solution repository uses Long for the Person.id, which indicates the intended design is to use Long IDs.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the Person.id type across the template to match the repository, controllers, and tests. The simplest fix is to change the id field in the template Person.java from java.util.UUID to Long (java.lang.Long), update the corresponding getter and setter to use Long, and remove the unnecessary UUID import. Ensure @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY) remains appropriate. This will make the template consistent with PersonRepository<Person, Long> and the solution implementation.

issues.description: In the template repository, the Person entity's primary key field is declared as java.util.UUID (private java.util.UUID id;) while the repository and REST layer expect a Long id (PersonRepository extends JpaRepository<Person, Long> and controller methods use Long personId). The solution repository uses Long for Person.id. This mismatch of the same conceptual entity (the person's primary key) across artifacts will confuse students (they will not be able to map repository/controller APIs to the Person class and will encounter compile/type errors).
issues.suggested_fix: Make the Person.id type consistent across artifacts. The simplest fix (and what the solution uses) is to change the template Person class to use Long for the id field and update its getter/setter signatures accordingly (private Long id; public Long getId(); public void setId(Long id);). Alternatively, if UUID is desired, update PersonRepository and all controller method signatures to use UUID consistently, but prefer aligning the template to Long to match the repository/controller code and the solution.
